nodes.text: A Wookiee male slave was kept in a slave camp run by a Trandoshan clan. At some point prior to 4 ABY, the slave broke out of his bonds and grabbed the young Trandoshan slaver Pekt in his massive paws. Pekt stared coldly at his attacker while his arms were torn off by the Wookiee, who was later killed for his efforts. The Trandoshan returned to his homeworld Trandosha to recuperate, and within a month his arms had regenerated.
The Wookiee slave was mentioned in Pekt's DataBank entry in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
